FuncDef:
The router id command sets the router ID in the RM module.
The undo router id command deletes the configured router ID. The router id command sets the router ID in the RM module. The undo router id command deletes the configured router ID. By default, the router ID in the RM module is 0.0.0.0 if no IPv4 interface address is configured for a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the router ID in the format of an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Some dynamic routing protocols, such as OSPF and BGP, require router IDs. If no router ID is specified when these routing protocols are started, the router ID in RM is used by default.
